argh, hehe I don't get it.. everyone here uses 11.04 and I am the only one with this weird kworker issue

did some research and asked around, and it looks like its a "kernel bug"
is it you're system disk or storage?
well thats the thing, I have one disk for operating system and one disk for storage (which is raid) I cant even tell which disk its read/writing to
